GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.14.302
GSD.description:
net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.302 by commit 8067cd244cea2c332f8326842fd10158fa2cb64f, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 57c5bc9ad7d799e9507ba6e993398d2c55f03fab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()
